Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by caz37 I totally understand your concerns, I've just had a transabdominal and transvaginal (last week). Doctor phoned me yesterday and told me that the hospital need to do another scan on my right ovary, also told me I have a fibroid mass and it is bulky, he mentioned that I might have to go to oncology and that it usually takes 6 months for an appointment to come through. I'm really worried but feel like I'm moaning if I discuss it with my husband. Am I just being negative by thinking the worst? Any info would help.
Posts.Title: after ultrasound

Posts.Content: I totally understand your concerns, I've just had a transabdominal and transvaginal (last week). Doctor phoned me yesterday and told me that the hospital need to do another scan on my right ovaryin 6 weeks, also told me I have a fibroid mass and it is bulky, he mentioned that I might have to go to oncology and that it usually takes 6 months for an appointment to come through. I'm really worried but feel like I'm moaning if I discuss it with my husband. Am I just being negative by thinking the worst? Any info would help.
Posts.Title: after ultrasound
